title: 求ChestCommands的权限，让所有人都能打开菜单
author: 小华mqh
txt_content: 求权限啊{:10_527:}权限前面用打/号吗

replies.author: Goblins
replies.txt_content:
小华mqh 发表于 2015-7-25 11:54
在哪里输入
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.item.菜单名.yml
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.open.菜单名.yml
游戏内或者控制台输入都一样

replies.author: 小华mqh
replies.txt_content:
Goblins 发表于 2015-7-25 12:01
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.item.菜单名.yml
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.open.菜单名.yml
游 ...
菜单名是那个

replies.author: 海牛的麻烦
replies.txt_content: /mangaddp 玩家组 chestcommands.open.配置好的菜单名.yml
